description: The cell is very narrow. In-front of you is a rusted barred door.

directions.description: You have exited the prison cell.

description: You are in the prison room. There is a prison cell at the North-West. There is light peering from a doorway on the south side of the room.

directions.description: You have entered the North-West Prison Cell.
You have entered the Training Room.

name.name: a set of keys on the ground

description: You are in what seems to be an abandoned room used for combat training. There are a set of three wooden mannequins standing in the side of the room. The Prison Room is through a doorway on the North side of the room. There is a doorway on east side of the room that leads to a hallway.

directions.description: You have entered the Prison Room.

consequences.description: You should train on these mannequins.

interactions.description: You examine the mannequin on the center.

consequences.successDescription: You make a big slit on the mannequin despite the sword being made out of wood. This makes you feel powerful.

interactions.description: It might be right, but don't lsiten to it.

description: You are in the dungeon hallway. There is a North doorway that leads to an Alchemy Lab. The dungeons exit gate is located East down the hallway. There is also a South doorway that leads to a Pantry. The west doorway leads back to the Training Room.

directions.description: You have entered the Training Room.
You have entered the Alchemy Lab.

interactions.description: This seems to be the main entrence.

consequences.description: You can see outside, threes are waving to the wind, but a troll is waiting for you at the entrence, better not take that route if you want to be back home in one piece.
consequences.successDescription: The troll is gone, you can finally escape, and oh boy, you do!

consequences.description: You run outside, welcomed by the soft wind and the grassy smells.

description: You are in the Alchemy Lab. There is an East doorway that is abstracted by rubble. South leads back to the Hallway.

items.description: A staff with "Explosion" engraved into it.

consequences.description: The tip of the staff makes the whole place shake, you hear something crumbling.

interactions.description: You examine the rubble, it seems fragile.

name.name: A pile of rubble blocking the path.

consequences.description: The rubble is blocking the way but you can clearly see some sort of entrence.
consequences.successDescription: The eartquake that your staff caused removed the rubble partially, you decide to enter.

consequences.description: You manage to walk between the rubble bits and discover a secret room.

description: You are in the Pantry. North leads back to the Hallway.
You are in the Hidden Room. There is a large rusty lever on the wall. West leads back to the Alchemy Lab.

directions.description: You have entered the Alchemy Lab.

interactions.description: You examine the lever, it's a good old lever.

consequences.description: You hear some sort of alarm.

description: You are in a lively forest, there's no signs of the dungeon you just escaped from. Congratulations, you won.
